channel.title: [delta]pk system farming
channel.description:
Hi people farm each other, so i edited that losers will lose pkpoints but people can still farm their lvl3s via same ip, i can disable multi logs
but itd be better if anyone could guide me how to stop people getting PKpoints after killing someone three times in a row, and someone from the same ip
cheers
